item.content:encoded:
Price: $60.00 - $54.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 15:18:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Product Specs DIMENSIONS:- W16.9” (43cm) x H53.1”(135cm) x D5.9” (15cm) MATERIAL:- Poly-PVC material & knitted fabric edges Internal fibreglass rods & cardboard support 2 x Adjustable stainless steel hooks 1 x Foldable coat hanger hook 1 x Portable Pet Treat Bag 2 x detachable black hooks Anti-rust metal rings and zipper

Introducing The PawStore

What is the PawStore?

The PawStore is simply the best place to store all your pet accessories in one convenient place.

We designed unique features especially for pet parents with pets in mind to help keep orgainzed.

KEY BENEFITS:

Easy way to organize your pet supplies Free up storage space in your home Specially designed features for pet accessories Large capacity storage – Wider and deeper compartments Never lose your pet’s accessories again Easy access to your pet’s accessories, treats, medication & treatments Quick and easy to assemble Ideal for dogs, cats, puppies, kittens & small pets

Free up Space in Your Home

Need more room in your home or just want to store all your pet accessories in one place?

The PawStore has wider and deeper compartments holding items up to 14 inches high (35.5cm) on the bottom compartment

Easy to Assemble

Takes seconds – no tools required – just hook the PawStore to the back of a door or on a coat peg, insert the floorboard supports supplied and it’s ready to store all your pet products

Easy Access to Your Pet’s Accessories

Place the PawStore in a room that’s most convenient for you and your pet.

No more searching around your home or workplace for pet accessories – everything is stored in one convenient location!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.9 x 5.9 x 53.1 inches; 3.46 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 1, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Semper Innovations
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09FT934JW

LARGE CAPACITY STORAGE: Compartments are both wider and deeper, holding items up to 14 inches high (35.5cm) on the bottom compartment, making the PawStore the perfect solution to free up space in your home and keep all your pet accessories, supplies, treatments & medication in one convenient location. Providing a more suitable alternative to generic over-the-door hanging organizers or dog toy bins
HIGH QUALITY – Built with strong, durable Poly-PVC material and knitted fabric edges, the PawStore is much tougher than non-woven fabric for storing pet stuff – Other features include:- Internal fibreglass rods and robust cardboard provide extra support – Breathable mesh perspective windows enable you to see into the compartments and top pockets – Anti-rust metal rings and zipper – Elasticated straps underneath and internally for optimum organization and storage – Can be wiped with damp cloth
INCLUDES: 2 x Adjustable stainless steel hooks to hang over doors of varying width up to 2” (5cm) | 1 x Foldable & Twisting Coat Hanger Hook to hang on coat pegs, rails or barn doors | 1 x Portable Pet Treat Bag | 4 x Floorboard supports | 2 x detachable black hook clip rings | DIMENSIONS (excluding coat hanger hook):- W16.9” (43cm) x H53.1”(135cm) x D5.9” (15cm)
QUICK & EASY ASSEMBLY – Takes seconds – no tools required – just hook the PawStore to the back of a door, hook, peg or rail, insert the floorboard supports supplied and it’s ready to store all your pet products – Perfect for the Utility, Kitchen, Basement, Garage, Pantry, Hallway, Porch, Front door, Under the Stairs, Spare Room, Closet, Office or Workplace

Product Specs
  • DIMENSIONS:- W16.9” (43cm) x H53.1”(135cm) x D5.9” (15cm)
  • MATERIAL:- Poly-PVC material & knitted fabric edges
  • Internal fibreglass rods & cardboard support
  • 2 x Adjustable stainless steel hooks
  • 1 x Foldable coat hanger hook
  • 1 x Portable Pet Treat Bag
  • 2 x detachable black hooks
  • Anti-rust metal rings and zipper

Introducing The PawStore

What is the PawStore?

The PawStore is simply the best place to store all your pet accessories in one convenient place.

We designed unique features especially for pet parents with pets in mind to help keep orgainzed.

KEY BENEFITS:

  • Easy way to organize your pet supplies
  • Free up storage space in your home
  • Specially designed features for pet accessories
  • Large capacity storage – Wider and deeper compartments
  • Never lose your pet’s accessories again
  • Easy access to your pet’s accessories, treats, medication & treatments
  • Quick and easy to assemble
  • Ideal for dogs, cats, puppies, kittens & small pets

Place the PawStore in a room that’s most convenient for you and your pet.

No more searching around your home or workplace for pet accessories – everything is stored in one convenient location!
